channel.title: Help ME! plz! with lvlving
channel.description: Hi well as u may no I am the owner of DavidAndAaronScape and we are doing many updates like harder lvlving changeing starter kits like when u type ::starter and what u get when u log in I can not get the lvlving to harder can some plz explain this to me and i have no clue how change starter kit and what u start with so if u coule plz help and try out the server sometime:p

item.title: Help ME! plz! with lvlving
item.dc:creator: @_R_E_B_O_R_N ~R E B O R N~
item.description:
@_R_E_B_O_R_N wrote:

the only guess i have is did you change the other addskillxp under the first 1?
heres just a little snippit:

sendMessage("You search the manhole and wind blows you away but you survive"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(1658); did you change these to? >>>>addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[2]), 2); >>>>> >addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[3]), 3); >>>> addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[18]), 18); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Help ME! plz! with lvlving
item.dc:creator: @slything slything
item.description:
@slything wrote:

ok now when we change the xp dummys bails and doors give it gives what we told it to first time then like 8k rest how can we stop this/[br][size=1]Posted on: May 24, 2007, 05:58:22 PM[/size][hr]Someone help me plz!!

Read full topic

item.title: Help ME! plz! with lvlving
item.dc:creator: @_R_E_B_O_R_N ~R E B O R N~
item.description:
@_R_E_B_O_R_N wrote:

to edit the starter kit go to your client.java and press Crtl F and search for the code i posted or starter a couple times or so then go down and there should be additem codes and stuff so change the items, heres what mine says:

addItem(995,200000000); addItem(6583,1); addItem(1053,1); addItem(1055,1); addItem(1057,1); addItem(3140,1);but i have fr33sc4p3 so if you have fr33sc4p3 search for that

Read full topic
